scan_metadata.description: account - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Manual Effort - Requires review and update of contact details
check_functions.description: Ensures account contact details are current

check_functions.execution_type: Manual Effort - Requires review and update of separate contacts
check_functions.description: Verifies different contacts for security, billing, and operations

check_functions.execution_type: Manual Effort - Requires registration of security contact
check_functions.description: Checks if security contact information is registered

check_functions.execution_type: Manual Effort - Requires registration of security questions
check_functions.description: Verifies security questions are registered in the account
